block.name: Random Source
block.doc: Generate Num Samples random numbers in the range [min, max). Repeat samples if specified. With min=0 and max=2, the sequence 01110101... will be generated.

param.name: Output Type
param.doc: Specifies the data type of the output.

param.name: Minimum
param.doc: Sets the minimum value that will occur in the output.

param.name: Maximum
param.doc: The maximum value that will occur in the output will be Maximum-1.

param.name: Repeat
param.doc: Selects whether to repeat the sequence or not.

option.name: Yes
option.doc: Repeat the sequence after Num Samples samples.

option.name: No
option.doc: Do not repeat after Num Samples. There will be no output from the Random Source and the flow graph will appear to hang.
